author: stoddard
msg: This fixes a performance problem with directory indexing on Windows.

author: wrowe
msg: Eliminate all assumptions that finfo.protection reflects the existance
or absense of a file.  finfo.filetype is defined as 0 if APR_NOFILE,
or a non-zero value if the file could be apr_stat()'ed.

author: wrowe
msg: *) Fixed a problem with file extensions being truncated during

author: stoddard
msg: apr_stat() in http_request.c only needs size, type, mtime, ctime & atime values from
the file. Modify apr_stat() under windows to accomodate apr_stat( APR_FINFO_MIN)

author: wrowe
msg: 1.3.15, what 1.3.15 ... and clarify the results from Mike Pilato's tests.
